svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2024-04-17T21:59:57.131Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/20.7.4 Chrome/106.0.5249.199 Electron/21.3.3 Safari/537.36" etag="5G3XbQqUfL8Hu6xnwPQT" version="20.7.4" type="device"><diagram id="ahAyE9eUKxN_0jiChCt0" name="Sayfa -1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 403px; margin-left: 12px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
The Fluent API sets up a one-to-one relationship by using the UserId property, which
contains the personâ€™s unique Id, as the foreign key to link to the ContactInfo. The command
HasPrincipalKey both defines the UserId property as an alternate key and creates the foreignkey
constraint link between the UserIdentifier property in the ContactInfo entity and the
UserId in the Person entity.

switch.text: The Fluent API sets up a one-to-one relationship by using the UserId property, which...
